name: The Haunting of Fractured Peak (demo)
description: THE HAUNTING OF FRACTURED PEAK is about three best friends and their dog who return to their favorite summer vacation spot before the start of their freshman year of college. But upon arrival, strange things seem to be happening, and the place where they made so many memories is in danger of being sold and demolished. It's up to them to figure out what's going down and try to put a stop to it!
